title: AccessibilityForms Introduction

metadata.description: Learn about AccessibilityForms Introduction with clear explanations and practical examples.

content_sections.title: Details
content_sections.content:
An HTML form is used to collect user input. This module will teach you how to make accessible forms. We will cover the basic form elements like
<input>
,
<label>
,
<fieldset>
and
<select>
, not custom form components.
Forms come in a variety of ways. From simple search forms to order forms and complex multistep forms.
Even this simple search field is a form.
The most important element to make sure your form is accessible is a label. Not necessarily a
<label>
. What is the difference, you might wonder? Continue to
learn about labels
.
